author: mysticryuujin
content:
currently running docker-compose with:
```
entrypoint: /eth2stats-client
    command: 'run --eth2stats.node-name=MysticRyuujin-Prysm --data.folder=/data --eth2stats.addr="api.zinken.eth2.wtf" --eth2stats.tls=false --beacon.type=prysm --beacon.addr="prysm-beacon:4000" --beacon.metrics-addr=http://prysm-beacon:8080/metrics'
```
